message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what you'd initially think. Considering its true worth and your potential satisfaction, I'm extending an offer to sell it to you for $110. This is a special opportunity tailored for you, aiming to provide you with the best value while ensuring we receive a fair return for our efforts and resources. I look forward to your positive response.
